016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.parser;
017
018import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidMolecularSpecies;
019import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.ConstraintViolationException;
020import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidStructureDefined;
021import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidFaBondType;
022import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidClassMeta;
023import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidSnPosition;
024import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.Headgroup;
025import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidClasses;
026import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidCompleteStructure;
027import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidAdduct;
028import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.Adduct;
029import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidLevel;
030import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidCategory;
031import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.FattyAcid;
032import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidSpecies;
033import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.LipidFullStructure;
034import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.HeadgroupDecorator;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.Arrays;
037import java.util.HashSet;
038import java.util.LinkedList;
039import java.util.List;
040import org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain.KnownFunctionalGroups;
041
042/**
043 *
044 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
045 * @author Nils Hoffmann
046 */
047public abstract class LipidBaseParserEventHandler extends BaseParserEventHandler<LipidAdduct> {
048
049    protected LipidLevel level = LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE;
050    protected String headGroup = "";
051    protected FattyAcid lcb = null;
052    protected List<FattyAcid> faList = new LinkedList<>();
053    protected FattyAcid currentFa = null;
054    protected Adduct adduct = null;
055    protected ArrayList<HeadgroupDecorator> headgroupDecorators = new ArrayList<>();
056    protected boolean useHeadGroup = false;
057    protected KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
058
059    protected static HashSet<String> SP_EXCEPTION_CLASSES = new HashSet<>(Arrays.asList("Cer", "Ceramide", "Sphingosine", "So", "Sphinganine", "Sa", "SPH", "Sph", "LCB"));
060
061    public LipidBaseParserEventHandler(KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
062        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
063    }
064
065    protected void setLipidLevel(LipidLevel _level) {
066        level = level.level < _level.level ? level : _level;
067    }
068
069    protected boolean spRegularLcb() {
070        return Headgroup.getCategory(headGroup) == LipidCategory.SP && (currentFa.getLipidFaBondType() == LipidFaBondType.LCB_REGULAR || currentFa.getLipidFaBondType() == LipidFaBondType.LCB_EXCEPTION) && !(SP_EXCEPTION_CLASSES.contains(headGroup) && headgroupDecorators.isEmpty());
071    }
072
073    protected Headgroup prepareHeadgroupAndChecks() {
074        Headgroup headgroup = new Headgroup(headGroup, headgroupDecorators, useHeadGroup);
075        if (useHeadGroup) {
076            return headgroup;
077        }
078        
079        headGroup = headgroup.getClassName();
080
081        int true_fa = 0;
082        for (FattyAcid fa : faList) {
083            true_fa += (fa.getNumCarbon() > 0 || fa.getDoubleBonds().getNumDoubleBonds() > 0) ? 1 : 0;
084        }
085        int poss_fa = (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > headgroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).possibleNumFa : 0;
086
087        // make lyso
088        boolean can_be_lyso = (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > Headgroup.getClass("L" + headGroup)) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(Headgroup.getClass("L" + headGroup)).specialCases.contains("Lyso") : false;
089        LipidClassMeta l = LipidClasses.getInstance().get(Headgroup.getClass("LCL"));
090        if (true_fa + 1 == poss_fa && level != LipidLevel.SPECIES && headgroup.getLipidCategory() == LipidCategory.GP && can_be_lyso) {
091            headGroup = "L" + headGroup;
092            headgroup = new Headgroup(headGroup, headgroupDecorators, useHeadGroup);
093            poss_fa = (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > headgroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).possibleNumFa : 0;
094        } else if (true_fa + 2 == poss_fa && level != LipidLevel.SPECIES && headgroup.getLipidCategory() == LipidCategory.GP && headGroup.equals("CL")) {
095            headGroup = "DL" + headGroup;
096            headgroup = new Headgroup(headGroup, headgroupDecorators, useHeadGroup);
097            poss_fa = (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > headgroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).possibleNumFa : 0;
098        }
099
100        if (level == LipidLevel.SPECIES) {
101            if (true_fa == 0 && poss_fa != 0) {
102                throw new ConstraintViolationException("No fatty acyl information lipid class '" + headgroup.getHeadgroup() + "' provided.");
103            }
104        } else if (true_fa != poss_fa && LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED.level)) {
105            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Number of described fatty acyl chains (" + Integer.toString(true_fa) + ") not allowed for lipid class '" + headgroup.getHeadgroup() + "' (having " + Integer.toString(poss_fa) + " fatty aycl chains).");
106        } else if (LipidClasses.getInstance().get(Headgroup.getClass(headGroup)).specialCases.contains("Lyso") && true_fa > poss_fa){
107            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Number of described fatty acyl chains (" + Integer.toString(true_fa) + ") not allowed for lipid class '" + headgroup.getHeadgroup() + "' (having " + Integer.toString(poss_fa) + " fatty aycl chains).");
108        }
109
110        if (LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("HC")) {
111            faList.get(0).setLipidFaBondType(LipidFaBondType.ETHER);
112        }
113
114        if (LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).specialCases.contains("Amide")) {
115            for (FattyAcid fatty : faList){
116                fatty.setLipidFaBondType(LipidFaBondType.AMIDE);
117            }
118        }
119
120        int max_num_fa = (LipidClasses.getInstance().size() > headgroup.getLipidClass()) ? LipidClasses.getInstance().get(headgroup.getLipidClass()).maxNumFa : 0;
121        if (max_num_fa != faList.size()) {
122            setLipidLevel(LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES);
123        }
124
125        if (faList.size() > 0 && headgroup.isSpException()) {
126            faList.get(0).setType(LipidFaBondType.LCB_EXCEPTION);
127        }
128
129        return headgroup;
130    }
131
132    protected LipidSpecies assembleLipid(Headgroup headgroup) {
133        LipidSpecies ls = null;
134        switch (level) {
135            case COMPLETE_STRUCTURE ->
136                ls = new LipidCompleteStructure(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
137            case FULL_STRUCTURE ->
138                ls = new LipidFullStructure(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
139            case STRUCTURE_DEFINED ->
140                ls = new LipidStructureDefined(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
141            case SN_POSITION ->
142                ls = new LipidSnPosition(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
143            case MOLECULAR_SPECIES ->
144                ls = new LipidMolecularSpecies(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
145            case SPECIES ->
146                ls = new LipidSpecies(headgroup, faList, knownFunctionalGroups);
147            default -> {
148            }
149        }
150        return ls;
151    }
152
153}
